title: Shikshy mantra coaching institute app with Admin panel and Student signup

requirements.text: Create a public landing page for the coaching institute named "Shikshy mantra" with clear navigation to Student Signup and Admin Panel.

quotes: Make app for Coching institute that's name Shikshy mantra, add a admin panel and add a student signup panel

acceptanceCriteria: App shows a landing/home page titled "Shikshy mantra"
Landing page includes prominent links/buttons to "Student Signup" and "Admin Panel"
Routes are accessible via client-side navigation (no full page reload required)

requirements.text: Implement a Student Signup panel that lets a user register a student profile (at minimum: full name, phone number, email, course of interest) and then view their submitted profile.
acceptanceCriteria: Student can submit the signup form and receives a success state
Submitted student signup is persisted in the backend and remains available after page refresh
Student can view the details of their submitted signup (at least the fields they entered)
Form validates required fields and shows user-friendly error messages in English

requirements.text: Implement an Admin Panel that is protected so only designated admin principals can access it, and that allows admins to view the list of student signups and open a detail view for each signup.
acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users cannot access the Admin Panel and are prompted to sign in
Authenticated non-admin users cannot access the Admin Panel and see an access denied message
Admin users can view a list/table of student signups
Admin users can click a signup to view full details

requirements.text: Add backend data models and APIs to store and retrieve student signups, including: create signup, list signups (admin-only), and get signup by id (admin-only).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes update method to create a student signup and returns a unique id
Backend exposes query methods for admin to list all signups and fetch a specific signup by id
Admin-only methods enforce authorization based on caller principal
Data is stored in stable state so signups persist across canister upgrades/restarts

requirements.text: Add Internet Identity based authentication UI for the app, including sign-in/sign-out controls and showing the current signed-in principal (or a friendly logged-out state).
acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in and sign out using Internet Identity
UI clearly indicates whether the user is signed in or not
Admin Panel route requires authentication before attempting admin authorization

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (layout, typography, spacing, color palette) suitable for an education/coaching institute brand; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent header/navigation styling
Theme uses a distinct, non-blue/purple primary palette consistently across buttons, links, and key UI accents
UI is readable and responsive on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Generate and include static brand images for "Shikshy mantra" and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (not via backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated
Landing page displays the logo image
Images are referenced as static assets (no backend endpoints used to serve them)

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if upgrading existing stable state requires it.
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead of modifying them.
nonGoals: Third-party auth providers other than Internet Identity

required: Minimal modern wordmark logo reading “Shikshy mantra” (shikshy-mantra-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Warm, education-themed hero illustration with books/stationery and abstract shapes (shikshy-mantra-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
